Notes

Welcome to my working notes. I write in public about what has my interest. Notes usually start out small (or empty), and grow as I do. The notes are densely linked, unfinished, possibly incorrect, and always ready for improvement. Any note that starts with an asterisk *, know that it‚Äôs an Evergreen note.

  • * ask why more often than you ask how
  • * change requires revolution and evolution
  • * connection is the fuel of life
  • * diet culture is dangerous
  • * discomfort is sometimes where growth happens
  • * ideas can change
  • * one of my most important pursuits is to see what water is
  • * people try to do what they think will make the world a better place
  • * the judeo Christian tradition is a harmful and unnecessary invention of christianity
  • * tools don't matter
  • * uxr should borrow from existing scientific methods
  • * we laugh at those brave enough to do the things we fear
  • * write for yourself first
  • * yin yoga trains the discomfort muscle
